name: Darkless
description:
Darkless looms over the Silent Mansion under the mysterious moonlight!

Ghosts and spirits lurk, seeking to sow fear, but it could be that Nameless has unleashed more than he imagined.

After being sentenced to the prison of a lamp as punishment for defying the powerful organization that rules the Mansion, Nameless is willing to do whatever it takes to defeat his enemies. Will you join him in this desperate battle?

GET READY FOR AN EPIC ADVENTURE!


● Immerse yourself in an exciting single-player campaign with diverse and unique locations.
● Use your light as your faithful guide to navigate mysterious worlds.
● Uncover all the mysterious spectral medallions hidden throughout the levels.
● Embark on a chilling journey through a nightmarish world where appearances can deceive.
● Make friends with intriguing characters along your journey, each with their own fascinating personality.

DISCOVER THE DARK WONDER OF DARKLESS


Are you ready to enter the exciting world of children's horror? With Darkless, we have created an exciting 2D platformer that is suitable for all ages. In this game, the player's skill is tested in daring jumps and challenging puzzles, while exploring our protagonist's unique mechanic: the amazing light he emanates.

We challenge you, player, will you be the hero who defeats the sinister X-Men, who have plunged the entire mansion into darkness? And most crucial of all, will you be able to recover Nameless's body from the clutches of the X-Men and their dark selfish designs? The fate of the mansion depends on you!

Are you ready to face this exciting adventure full of terror and mystery? Discover the world of Darkless now!
